Description: La vie est belle, a French expression meaning, Life is beautiful; the manifesto of a new era. Universal yet personal, Lancôme femininity is a choice embraced by women, not an imposed standard. The choice to live one life and fill it with beauty. Your own way. The juice is made with the most precious natural ingredients, a modern interpretation of an Oriental fragrance with a twist of gourmand. It entwines the elegance of iris with the strength of Patchouli and the sweetness of a gourmand blend; for an incredible scent with depth and complexity.
ReviewText: I adore this fragrance! Mmmmm...beautiful, captivating, sweet, delicious - very sophisticated and feminine. This fragrance opens with the juicy sweet pear and black currant, then develops into a powdery and soft smell of the iris. When it dries I smell the praline and vanilla, it is still powdery, but less juicy. The patchouli is very soft. As it develops, it becomes even more beautiful. The longevity is astounding - it lasts all day. The bottle is elegant and lovely with the accent bow. Very nice job, Lancome! Get it for your wife or girlfriend, or mom, or sister, or any woman you think highly of! La Vie Est Belle Eau de Parfum was the best gift ever for me.  HAPPINESS in the bottle.

ReviewText: A limited edt. 2014 scent Terracotta started with a slightly bitter orange blossom note.
